name: Vikare Battle
subtitle: Everai x Argent x Starknet
description: Set during the iconic Battle of Vikare, the game invites players to engage in a competitive, idle-based gameplay within the Telegram ecosystem.
This strategic choice brings the lore to life while utilizing Telegram's interaction and sharing capabilities.

name: Overdrive
subtitle: Cartridge x Starknet
description: Overdrive is a fast-paced mobile game blending strategic card mechanics with high-speed racing.
Hack, combine, and deploy abilities to outmaneuver your rival and cross the finish line first. Perfect timing and clever strategy are your keys to victory.

name: Depths of Dread
subtitle: Cartridge x Starknet
description: Navigate deadly dungeons in this top-down roguelike where every floor is a challenge. Memorize the path revealed at the start, dodge hidden traps, and outwit enemies in your quest to escape.
Collect treasures to boost your score, but bewareâ€”one wrong move resets your progress. With retro visuals and intense gameplay, Depths of Dread is your ultimate test of skill and strategy.
